divs: sighting detailsthis is a photograph i received from a relative which i had digitally scanned at a local printshop. my relative said that the dark object in the sky (top-right of lighthouse) was not apparent at the time this photograph was taken. however the anomaly was clearly apparent upon review\development of the photograph - as you can see. said relative did not report any unusual happenings or unusual emotions while at the lighthouse. as i have seen the original photograph, i can safely say that upon close inspection, the blurry black disc distinctly "appears" to be behind the lighthouse in perspective (vs. in between the camera and the lighthouse). the disc left a faint trail (blur) to its left, as though it was moving from left to right when the photo was taken. again, this trail appears to extend behind the tower, and not in front of it. i don't believe it is significant, but the man facing to the camera has strange eyes and hands.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Whitefish Bay
This sighting has never been favorited.
